entry.tran: (过程、活动的)技术细节，详细步骤
entry.def: The technicalities of a process or activity are the detailed methods used to do it or to carry it out.
A technicality is a point, especially a legal one, that is based on a strict interpretation of the law or of a set of rules.

example.ex: The earlier verdict was overturned on a legal technicality.
example.tran: 由于诉讼程序上的一个技术细则，原先的判决被推翻了。

means.word_mean: 1. a detail that is considered insignificant
